name: Unhealthy Mess
description:
Hi, thanks for playing our game. This game was created in 3 days for Mini Jam 76. Theme was radiation and limitation was that the game must be playable with one hand. If you like our game, you can rate it on Itch website. 

Creators: Martin, Victor and Jacob

The web version has a significantly reduced quality, it is possible to download the game as an .exe.
